properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

select notice_no, notice_title, notice_date, member_id from ( select rownum rnum, A.notice_no, A.notice_title, A.notice_date, A.member_id from (select notice_no, notice_title, notice_date, member_id from notice join member using (member_no) where notice.status = 'Y' order by notice_date desc) A ) where rnum between ? and ?
